VideoGames.VideoGameDescription: Set in the fictional world of Azeroth, WoW allows players to create avatar-style characters and explore a sprawling universe while interacting with nonreal players-called nonplayer characters (NPCs)-and other real-world players (PCs).
Wizard101 is a massively multiplayer online role-playing game. In the game, players take on the role of students in order to save their galaxy from multiple threats.
Overwatch 2 is a 2022 first-person shooter. The game intends a shared environment for player-versus-player modes while introducing persistent cooperative modes.

VideoGames.GameName: Call of Duty Modern Warefare II
VideoGames.VideoGameDescription: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II is a first-person shooter game. It is a direct sequel to the 2019 reboot, and serves as the nineteenth installment in the overall Call of Duty series.

Apex Legends is a battle royale-hero shooter game. players in squads of two or three select a character with pre-set abilities, referred to as a Legend, and battle against other players to become Apex Champions.

StarCraft II is a science fiction real-time strategy video game. players juggle big-picture economy and micro-level unit control, pushing them to the very limits of their strategic and tactical capabilities.

Heros Of The Storm is a crossover multiplayer online battle arena video game. The game team-based competitive game in which each player controls a powerful Hero with unique Abilities, and works with his or her team to destory the enemy team's core to claim victory.
League Of Legends is a team-based strategy game where two teams of five powerful champions face off to destroy the other enemy team's core.
Diablo III is a hack-and-slash action role-playing game. You play a hero who engages in fast-paced combat that tests your reflexes.

Ark:Surviavl Evolved is an Action Adventure Survival game. You are stranded on the shores of a mysterious island, you must learn to survive. kill or tame the creatures roaming the land, and encounter other players to survive.
